# SMS Forwarding Android App - Project Instructions

This is an Android application that forwards incoming SMS messages to a Telegram bot.

## Project Overview
- Language: Kotlin
- Minimum SDK: 24 (Android 7.0)
- Target SDK: 34
- Features:
  - SMS monitoring with broadcast receiver
  - Background service for continuous monitoring
  - Telegram bot integration
  - Configuration UI for bot token and chat ID

## Development Guidelines
- Use Kotlin for all source files
- Follow Android best practices for permissions and background services
- Implement proper error handling for network operations
- Use SharedPreferences for storing configuration
